title: ArXiv Search
shortdesc: A GET-request based search operation for searching through arXiv.
desc: This allows GPT to make requests for entries from [arXiv,](https://arxiv.org/) a free distribution service and an open-access archive for millions of scholarly articles via the `https://export.arxiv.org` endpoint. The specification for said endpoint can be found [here.](https://info.arxiv.org/help/api/index.html)
author: bapo2
